remarks: The greatest lower bound is the least element.  (Contributed by NM, 22-Oct-2011.)  (Revised by NM, 7-Sep-2018.)
statement:
lubprop.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lubprop.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lubprop.u $e |- U = ( lub ` K ) $.
lubprop.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. V ) $.
lubprop.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. dom U ) $.
luble.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. S ) $.
luble $p |- ( ph -> X .<_ ( U ` S ) ) $.
